item.description:
Organized and lead by the DCR and Trustees of Reservations:

Sunday March 7 1 pm
Wilson Mountain
Partners in Stewardship Hike
Meet at the Wilson Mountain parking lot on Rt. 135 in Dedham. Call 617-333-7404, ext.101 for detailed directions.

Directions
By Car: Off of Route 128/95, Exit 17, Route 135. Head towards Dedham. Parking lot 1/2 mile on right.

Join rangers from the DCR and the Trustees of Reservations on a moderate hike at Wilson Mountain in Dedham.
Enjoy a scenic ramble as we meander through wetlands and hike among the hillsides of mountain laurel. We will
discuss the reservationâ€™s past, present and future. Leashed dogs welcome. 1.5 hours
item.name: Wilson Mountain in Dedham
